ComicInfo.Characters: Citizen Pain,Ernest Huston,Family Man,Lieutenant Cheri Major
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T19:13:08 [Issue ID 4000-154890] urn:comicvine:4000-154890
ComicInfo.Summary: He is in her home. The man that Cheri Major has sworn to destroy, Citizen Pain, has skulked around in the shadows of her dreams for months. Now he's here, in the flesh, holding her at gunpoint, in the one place where she is suppose to feel the most safe, her own home. What will he do to her? What message will he impart? Cheri's struggle to make the connection between the serial killer "Family Man" and the vigilante Citizen Pain continues. A truth is revealed through brutal confrontation, a single truth that only deepens the mystery.
ComicInfo.Title: Book of Job, Chapter 3
